title: HotspotTransformPositionConfig
description: An instance of a hotspot transform position.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: The radius, ie the distance between the camera and the hotspot (soon to be deprecated)

theta.title: Theta
theta.description: The position on the horizontal axis in degrees (soon to be deprecated)

phi.title: Phi
phi.description: The position on the vertical axis in degrees (soon to be deprecated)

x.title: X
x.description: The position on the X axis of the world

y.title: Y
y.description: The position on the Y axis of the world

z.title: Z
z.description: The position on the Z axis of the world
